docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Café Luz
docs.text:
name: "Café Luz" type: "Budynek usługowy" area: "13 440 m²" stage: "Projekt budowlany / Projekt Wykonawczy"

Opis projektu, wizualizacje i rysunki.

import numbers from mkdocs.config import base, config_options as c

class _Rectangle(base.Config): width = c.Type(numbers.Real) # required height = c.Type(numbers.Real) # required

class MyPluginConfig(base.Config): add_rectangles = c.ListOfItems(c.SubConfig(_Rectangle)) # required
